methods.name: iapUpdateAdapterConfiguration
methods.description: Updates the adapter configuration file with the provided changes

input.name: configFile
input.info: The name of the file to change

input.name: changes
input.info: JSON object containing the configuration changes

input.name: entity
input.info: The entity in which the changes are being made

input.name: type
input.info: The type of file to change - action, schema, or mock

input.name: replace
input.info: True to replace entire mock data, false to merge/append

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

input.name: mode
input.info: How incoming requests are handled. Defaults to 'pause'
input.description: How incoming requests are handled. Defaults to 'pause'

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing the adapter suspended status

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing the adapter suspended status

methods.description: Return the requests that are waiting in the queue if throttling is enabled

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing the adapter queue

methods.name: iapFindAdapterPath
methods.summary: Provides the ability to see if a particular API path is supported by the adapter
methods.description: Provides the ability to see if a particular API path is supported by the adapter

input.name: apiPath
input.info: The API Path you want to check - make sure to not include base path and version
input.description: The API Path you want to check - make sure to not include base path and version

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing the result

input.name: props
input.info: Object containing configuration, healthcheck and auth properties {'connProps':{'host': 'api.service.com', 'base_path': '/', 'protocol': 'http', 'port': 443, 'version': 'v1'},'healthCheckEndpoint': '/healthcheck', 'auth': {'auth_method': 'no authentication', 'username': 'username', 'password': 'password'}}

input.name: persistFlag
input.info: Whether the input properties should be saved

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing the test results

output.name: result
output.description: Whether healthcheck passed or failed

methods.name: iapExpandedGenericAdapterRequest
methods.summary: Makes the requested generic call with additional options
methods.description: Makes the requested generic call with additional options via metadata

input.name: metadata
input.description: metadata for the call - allows for many enhancements (optional)

input.name: uriPath
input.info: the path of the api call - do not include the host, port, base path or version
input.description: the path of the api call

input.name: restMethod
input.info: the rest method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE)
input.description: the rest method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE)

input.name: pathVars
input.info: the parameters to be put within the url path (optional)
input.description: the parameters to be put within the url path (optional)

input.name: queryData
input.info: the query parameters to be put on the url (optional)
input.description: the query parameters to be put on the url (optional)

input.name: requestBody
input.info: the payload to be sent with the request (optional)
input.description: the payload to be sent with the request (optional)

input.name: addlHeaders
input.info: additional headers to be put on the call (optional)
input.description: additional headers to be put on the call (optional)

output.name: result
output.description: A JSON Object containing status, code and the result

input.info: the path of the api call - do not include the host, port, base path or version
